name: claroty
label: Claroty
description: Claroty CTD is a robust solution that delivers comprehensive cybersecurity controls for industrial environments. This connector provides automated actions like Get Assets, Get Alert, Get Alert Details, etc

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Server name or IP address of the Claroty server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username to access the Claroty server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password to access the Claroty server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. 
By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Assets
operations.description: Retrieves all assets or specific assets from Claroty based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Asset Type
parameters.name: asset_type__in
parameters.tooltip: Select asset type to filter assets based on it.
parameters.description: Select one or more asset types using which you want to filter assets retrieved from Claroty. You can select from options such as Endpoint, OT, PLC, etc.

parameters.title: Protocol
parameters.name: protocol__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select one or more asset protocols using which you want to filter assets retrieved from Claroty.
parameters.description: Select one or more asset protocols using which you want to filter assets retrieved from Claroty. You can select from options such as ARP, CIP, DNS, etc.

parameters.title: Asset Criticality
parameters.name: criticality__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select one or more asset criticality using which you want to filter assets retrieved from Claroty
parameters.description: Select one or more asset criticality using which you want to filter assets retrieved from Claroty. You can select from High, Medium, or Low.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: timestamp__gte
parameters.tooltip: Start time from when you want to retrieve assets from Claroty.
parameters.description: Start time from when you want to retrieve assets from Claroty.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: timestamp__lte
parameters.tooltip: End time till when you want to retrieve assets from Claroty.
parameters.description: End time till when you want to retrieve assets from Claroty.

parameters.title: Other Filters
parameters.name: filters
parameters.tooltip: Enter json key value pairs to filter the response based on it. e.g {"ipv4__exact": "1.1.1.1", "insight_status__exact": 1}
parameters.description:
Enter JSON key values to filter the assets response,from Claroty, based on the specified parameters. 
For example, {"ipv4__exact": "1.1.1.1", "insight_status__exact": 1}. 
The list of fields that can be used as keys on the filters paramaters page are: ipv4__exact, ipv6__exact, mac__icontains, vlan__exact, address__exact, gateway__exact, asset_type__exact, host_name__exact, os__exact, model__icontains, vendor__icontains, state__exact, domain_names__exact, firmware__exact, serial__exact, generic__icontains, display_name__icontains, criticality__exact, old_ip__exact, protocol__exact, last_seen__exact, q__icontains, alert_id__exact, baseline__exact, arp_baselines__exact, insight_status__exact, insights_insight_name__exact, insight_timestamp__gte, insight_timestamp__lte, baseline_category__exact, baseline_access_type__exact, insight_name__exact, insight_row_key__exact, ghost__exact, tasks__exact, active_queries__exact, subnet_tag__exact, custom_attributes__exact, class_type__exact, domain_name__exact, involved_in_tags__exact, hosted_tags__icontains, id__exact, site_id__exact, timestamp__exact, approved__exact, valid__exact, parsed__exact, special_hint__exact, risk_level__exact, network_id__exact, virtual_zone_id__exact, subnet_id__exact, and purdue_level__exact

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which you want to retrieve the response.

parameters.title: Format
parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
Select the format of the response (list of fields) returned by the query. You can select from Asset List, Insight Assets, or Resource IDs. 
Note:If you do not select any option, then all the properties of the assets are returned, which could affect performance.

operations.title: Get Asset Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific asset from Claroty based on the asset's resource ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.tooltip: Enter resource id of an asset which you wants to retrieve (in the format of <asset-id>-<site-id>)
parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: Specify the resource ID of the asset for which you want to retrieve details from Claroty. The resource ID should be specified in the format <asset-id>-<site-id>.

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves all alerts or specific alerts from Claroty based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: resolution__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select one or more alert statuses using which you want to filter alerts retrieved from Claroty
parameters.description: Select one or more alert statuses using which you want to filter alerts retrieved from Claroty. You can select Resolved Unresolved, or select both to retrieve both resolved and unresolved alerts from Claroty.

parameters.title: Category
parameters.name: category__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select one or more alert categories using which you want to filter alerts retrieved from Claroty.
parameters.description: Select one or more alert categories using which you want to filter alerts retrieved from Claroty. You can select Security Integrity, or select both to retrieve both categories of alerts from Claroty.

parameters.title: Alert Severity
parameters.name: severity__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select asset Severity to filter assets based on it.
parameters.description: Select one or more alert severities using which you want to filter alerts retrieved from Claroty. You can select from Critical High, Medium, or Low.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: timestamp__gte
parameters.tooltip: Start time from which you wants to fetch alerts
parameters.description: Start time from when you want to retrieve alerts from Claroty.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: timestamp__lte
parameters.tooltip: End time till when you want to retrieve alerts from Claroty
parameters.description: End time till when you want to retrieve alerts from Claroty

parameters.title: Other Filters
parameters.name: filters
parameters.tooltip: Enter json key values to filter the alerts response based on parameters provided. e.g{"asset_id__exact": "122", "severity__exact": 4}

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which you want to retrieve the response.

operations.title: Get Alert Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific alert from Claroty based on the alert's resource ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.tooltip: Enter resource id of an alert whose details you wants to retrieve.(in the format of <alert-id>-<site-id>)
parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: Specify the resource ID of the alert for which you want to retrieve details from Claroty. The resource ID should be specified in the format <asset-id>-<site-id>

operations.title: Get Tasks
operations.description: Retrieves all tasks or specific tasks and their associated information from Claroty based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Name Contains (Case-Sensitive)
parameters.name: name__icontains
parameters.tooltip: Filter tasks whose name contains input string
parameters.description: Name using which you want to filter tasks retrieved from Claroty to those tasks whose name contains the specified input string.

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: site_id__exact
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the site using which you want to filter tasks retrieved from Claroty
parameters.description: The ID of the site using which you want to filter tasks retrieved from Claroty

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which you want to retrieve the response.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Select the parameter using which you want to sort the response retrieved from Claroty. You can choose from the following options: "name","status","enabled","interval","start_time","end_time","allowed_run_time_start","allowed_run_time_end","last_run_results"

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Select the order based on which you wants to sort the response. Available options are Ascending and Descending

operations.title: Get Queries
operations.description: Retrieves all queries or specific queries and their associated information from Claroty based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Name Contains(case-sensitive)
parameters.name: name__icontains
parameters.tooltip: Name using which you want to filter queries retrieved from Claroty
parameters.description: Name using which you want to filter queries retrieved from Claroty to those queries whose name contains the specified input string.

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: site_id__exact
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the site using which you want to filter queries retrieved from Claroty.
parameters.description: The ID of the site using which you want to filter queries retrieved from Claroty.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Select the parameter using which you want to sort the response retrieved from Claroty. You can choose from the following options: "name","status","enabled","interval","start_time","end_time","allowed_run_time_start","allowed_run_time_end","last_run_results"

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Select the order based on which you wants to sort the response. Available options are Ascending and Descending

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response

operations.title: Get Insights
operations.description: Retrieves the summary of specific insights from Claroty based on the format, sort by fields, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Format
parameters.name: format
parameters.tooltip: Specify the format of the insights whose summaries you want to retrieve from Claroty. e.g insight_page
parameters.description: Specify the format of the insights whose summaries you want to retrieve from Claroty. e.g. insight_page

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the response based on given input parameter.

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Select the order based on which you wants to sort the response. Available options are Ascending and Descending

parameters.title: Host Exact
parameters.name: ghost__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter response data whose host exact matches input string
parameters.description: Select this option if you want to filter the response data retrieved from Claroty to that which exactly matches the host specified in the input string

parameters.title: Special Hint Exact
parameters.name: special_hint__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select the special hint to filter the response based on it. Available values are 0,1,2,3,4
parameters.description: Select the special hint using which you want to filter the response retrieved from Claroty. You can choose from the following options: 0, 1, 2, 3, or 4.

parameters.title: Insight Status Exact
parameters.name: insight_status__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select the insight status to filter the response based on it. Available values are 0,1,2
parameters.description: Select the insight status using which you want to filter the response retrieved from Claroty. You can choose from the following options: 0, 1, or 2.

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: site_id__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter response data based on input site ID
parameters.description: The ID of the site using which you want to filter insights retrieved from Claroty.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response

operations.title: Get Events
operations.description: Retrieves all events (associated with alerts) or specific events from Claroty based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: site_id
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the site using which you want to filter alerts (and associated events) retrieved from Claroty
parameters.description: The ID of the site using which you want to filter alerts (and associated events) retrieved from Claroty

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.name: id__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter events based on input resource ID. resource id in the format of <event-id>-<site-id>
parameters.description: The ID of the event using which you want to filter events retrieved from Claroty.

parameters.title: Alert Resource ID
parameters.name: alert_id__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter alerts based on input alert ID. alert resource id in the format of <alert-id>-<site-id>
parameters.description: The ID of the alert using which you want to filter events retrieved from Claroty. Alert resource id in the format of <alert-id>-<site-id>

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: timestamp__gte
parameters.tooltip: Start time from when you want to retrieve events
parameters.description: Start time from when you want to retrieve events

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: timestamp__lte
parameters.tooltip: End time till when you want to retrieve events
parameters.description: End time till when you want to retrieve events

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description__contains
parameters.tooltip: The description using which you want to filter events data retrieved from Claroty.
parameters.description: The description using which you want to filter events data retrieved from Claroty.

parameters.title: Description (case-sensitive)
parameters.name: description__icontains
parameters.tooltip: The description (case-sensitive) using which you want to filter events data retrieved from Claroty.
parameters.description: The description (case-sensitive) using which you want to filter events data retrieved from Claroty.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter alerts based on input type selected. Available values are
parameters.description: Select one or more alert types using which you want to filter events retrieved from Claroty.You can select from options such as 3 - Threat, 10 - FTP Data, etc.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter alerts based on input status selected. Available values are OT Alert, OT Operation, Alert and Not Risky Change
parameters.description: Select the alert status using which you want to filter events retrieved from Claroty. You can choose from the following options: OT Alert, OT Operation, Alert, or Not Risky Change.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Select the parameter using which you want to sort the response retrieved from Claroty.You can select from options such as id, site-id, type, etc.

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Select the order based on which you wants to sort the response. Available options are Ascending and Descending

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response

operations.title: Get Insight Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific insight from Claroty based on the insight name you have specified.

parameters.title: Insight Name
parameters.name: insight_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the insight name you want to retrieve from Claroty.

parameters.title: Format
parameters.name: format
parameters.tooltip: Specify the format of the insights whose summaries you want to retrieve from Claroty. e.g insight_page

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: site_id__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter response data based on input site ID

parameters.title: Host Exact
parameters.name: ghost__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter response data whose host exact matches input string

parameters.title: Special Hint Exact
parameters.name: special_hint__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select the special hint to filter the response based on it. Available values are 0,1,2,3,4

parameters.title: Insight Status Exact
